title: A Say in your community with the Australian Assistance Plan
brief_description: Made for he Social Welfare Commission and Department of Social welfare, the film explains the concept and illustrates the benefits available to community groups throughout Australia under the Australian Assistance Plan, a revolutionary concept in the identification of community need areas.
